name: Vivian's Inflation (CM)
description:
WARNING: Contains body expansion fetish content and implied nudity.

Hello! Here's a commissioned belly inflation mini-game for Loop4321 of Vivian from Paper Mario: TTYD. Art used is by Day-Tripper-Guy, check out his stuff!

Controls:
R to restart
Space, or click the upper pump button to increase belly size
Backspace, or click the lower pump button to reduce belly size
Z to start/increase gradual inflation, up to 5 times
X to halt automatic inflation
